com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenTextMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenTextMeasure

  • public class SpenTextMeasure
extends Object
    This class provides the methods for managing text-related measurements.

      SpenTextMeasure()
      Creates an SpenTextMeasure instance.

        public boolean setObjectText(SpenObjectTextBox objectText)
        Set the specified text box object.
        Parameters:
        objectText - The text box object.
        Returns:
        true – if the text box is successfully set. false – if the text box is not set.

        Get the rect of the smallest rectangle that encloses all the characters.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The RectF instance.

      • getLineStartIndex

        public int getLineStartIndex(int lineNumber)
        Get the text offset at the beginning of the specified line.
        Parameters:
        lineNumber - The line number.
        Returns:

      • getLineEndIndex

        public int getLineEndIndex(int lineNumber)
        Get the text offset after the last character on the specified line.
        Parameters:
        lineNumber - The line number.
        Returns:
        The last index in the specified line.
